heading: Applicant for permit
text:
The applicant for a permit shall be the person who performs the work or who retains a
   subcontractor to do the work.
     Exception: For permits issued for plumbing work, fire protection and suppression work, and oil burner/boiler work, the
     applicant for such permits shall be the licensed master plumber, licensed master fire suppression piping contractor, or licensed
     oil-burning equipment installer, respectively, who performs the work.
